overview: Spain passed a law in 2005 allowing same-sex marriages. This is the story of a gay couple, Julia and AÃ­da, who decide to have a baby. They approach Francesc, a gay friend of theirs, as a sperm donor. The documentary charts the 3-year story from the start to the birth of Kenia, their baby girl. The couple's quest and the reactions of family and colleagues are faithfully and sensitively portrayed in this true-life story.
title: Kenia and Her Family
